Type.Name: ObjectDisposedException

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ObjectDisposedException extends System.InvalidOperationException

Type.ThreadingSafetyStatement: All public static members of this type are safe for multithreaded operations. No instance members are guaranteed to be thread safe.

summary.para: Represents the error that occurs when an operation is performed on a disposed object.

para.block: For additional information about disposing objects, see the interface.

example.para: The following example demonstrates an error that causes the exception to be thrown.

c.para: Caught: Cannot access a closed Stream.

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string objectName) cil managed

Docs.param: A containing the name of the disposed object.

summary.para: Constructs and initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.para: This constructor initializes the property of the new instance using The property is initialized to a system-supplied message that describes the errorand includes . This message takes into account the current system culture.
The property of the new instance is initialized to .

para.block: If is , the property contains only an error message.

example.para: The following example displays the error message of a instance created using this constructor.

c.para: Caught: Cannot access a disposed object named "ExampleDisposableObject".

Docs.param: A containing the name of the disposed object.

A that describes the error. The content of is intended to be understood by humans. The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

summary.para: Constructs and initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.para: This constructor initializes the property of the new instance using , and the property using . If is , the property is initialized to the system-supplied message provided by the constructor that takes no arguments.
The property of the new instance is initialized to .

example.para: The following example throws a instance created using this constructor.

c.para: Caught: Oh-oh! This object has been disposed!
